    ps_3_0
    def c3, 0, 1, 0.999000013, 0.5
    def c4, 0.125, 0, 9.99999975e-005, -0.999899983
    def c5, 2, -1, 1, 0.125
    def c6, 0.0416666679, 0.699999988, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -I ../../.. --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 -f 2B3040DC.txt

mov r8.xyw, v0
add r31.w, r8.w, -r31.y
mad r8.x, r31.w, r31.x, r8.x

    rcp r0.x, r8.w
    mul r0.yz, r0.x, r8.xxyw
    mad r1.xy, r0.yzzw, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r1.zw, c3.x
    texldl r1, r1, s0
    mov r1.y, c3.y
    add r0.w, r1.y, -c2.y
    add r0.w, -r0.w, r1.w
    rcp r0.w, r0.w
    mul r0.w, r0.w, -c2.x
    mul r0.yz, r0.w, r0
    mul r2, r0.z, c21

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -I ../../.. --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 -f 2B3040DC.txt

mad r0.y, -r31.w, r31.x, r0.y

    mad r2, c20, r0.y, r2
    mad r2, c22, r0.w, r2
    add r2, r2, c23
    rcp r1.x, r2.w
    mul r1.zw, r1.x, r2.xyxy
    min r3.x, r2.z, c3.z
    mad r2.zw, r8.xyxy, r0.x, c3.y
    mul r2.zw, r2, c0.xyxy
    mul r2.zw, r2, c3.w
    texld r4, r2.zwzw, s2
    mad_pp r4, r4.yxyx, c5.x, c5.y
    mul_pp r5, r4.wzwz, c5.zyzy
    mad r6, r5.zwzw, c24.xxzz, r1.zwzw
    mad_pp r6, r4.zwzw, c24.yyww, r6
    texld_pp r7, r6, s1
    texld_pp r6, r6.zwzw, s1
    mov_pp r7.y, r6.x
    add r2.zw, r3.x, -r7.xyxy
    cmp r2.zw, r2, c3.x, c3.y
    mad r6, r5.zwzw, c25.xxzz, r1.zwzw
    mad_pp r6, r4.zwzw, c25.yyww, r6
    texld_pp r7, r6, s1
    texld_pp r6, r6.zwzw, s1
    mov_pp r7.y, r6.x
    add r3.yz, r3.x, -r7.xxyw
    cmp r3.yz, r3, c3.x, c3.y
    dp2add_pp r0.x, r3.yzzw, c4.x, c4.y
    dp2add_pp r0.x, r2.zwzw, c5.w, r0.x
    mad r6, r5.zwzw, c26.xxzz, r1.zwzw
    mad_pp r6, r4.zwzw, c26.yyww, r6
    texld_pp r7, r6, s1
    texld_pp r6, r6.zwzw, s1
    mov_pp r7.y, r6.x
    add r2.zw, r3.x, -r7.xyxy
    cmp r2.zw, r2, c3.x, c3.y
    dp2add_pp r0.x, r2.zwzw, c5.w, r0.x
    mad r5, r5, c27.xxzz, r1.zwzw
    mad_pp r4, r4, c27.yyww, r5
    texld_pp r5, r4, s1
    texld_pp r4, r4.zwzw, s1
    mov_pp r5.y, r4.x
    add r1.zw, r3.x, -r5.xyxy
    cmp r1.zw, r1, c3.x, c3.y
    dp2add_pp r0.x, r1.zwzw, c5.w, r0.x
    add r1.z, -r0.x, c4.z
    add r1.w, r0.x, c4.w
    cmp r1.w, r1.w, c3.x, c3.y

      mad_pp r4, r2.xyxy, r1.x, c8
      mul r5, r4.xyxx, c3.yyxx

      mul r4, r4.zwxx, c3.yyxx

      mad_pp r6, r2.xyxy, r1.x, c9
      mul r7, r6.xyxx, c3.yyxx

      mul r6, r6.zwxx, c3.yyxx

      cmp r4, r4, c3.x, c3.y
      dp4_pp r1.z, r4, c6.x

      mul r5, r4.xyxx, c3.yyxx

      mul r4, r4.zwxx, c3.yyxx

      texldl r6, r6, s1

      cmp r4, r4, c3.x, c3.y
      dp4_pp r1.w, r4, c6.x
      add_pp r1.z, r1.w, r1.z

      mul r5, r4.xyxx, c3.yyxx
      texldl r5, r5, s1
      mul r4, r4.zwxx, c3.yyxx
      texldl r4, r4, s1
      mad_pp r6, r2.xyxy, r1.x, c17
      mul r7, r6.xyxx, c3.yyxx
      texldl r7, r7, s1
      mul r6, r6.zwxx, c3.yyxx
      texldl r6, r6, s1
      mov r5.y, r4.x
      mov r5.z, r7.x
      mov r5.w, r6.x

      cmp r4, r4, c3.x, c3.y
      dp4_pp r1.w, r4, c6.x
      add_pp r1.z, r1.w, r1.z

      mul r5, r4.xyxx, c3.yyxx
      texldl r5, r5, s1
      mul r4, r4.zwxx, c3.yyxx
      texldl r4, r4, s1
      mad_pp r2, r2.xyxy, r1.x, c19
      mul r6, r2.xyxx, c3.yyxx
      texldl r6, r6, s1
      mul r2, r2.zwxx, c3.yyxx
      texldl r2, r2, s1
      mov r5.y, r4.x
      mov r5.z, r6.x

      add r2, r3.x, -r5
      cmp r2, r2, c3.x, c3.y

      lrp_pp r2.x, c6.y, r1.x, r0.x
      mov_pp r0.x, r2.x
    endif
    mul r1.xzw, r0.z, c29.xyyz
    mad r1.xzw, c28.xyyz, r0.y, r1
    mad r0.yzw, c30.xxyz, r0.w, r1.xxzw
    add r0.yzw, r0, c31.xxyz
    add r0.yzw, -r0, c33.xxyz
    mul r0.yzw, r0, c33.w
    dp3 r1.x, r0.yzww, r0.yzww
    rsq r1.x, r1.x
    rcp r1.z, r1.x
    mad r1.z, r1.z, c34.y, c34.z
    max r2.x, r1.z, c3.x
    mad r1.z, r2.x, -r2.x, c3.y
    max r2.x, r1.z, c3.x
    pow_pp r1.z, r2.x, c34.x
    mul r0.yzw, r0, r1.x
    dp3 r0.y, r0.yzww, -c35
    add r0.y, r0.y, -c36.x
    mul_sat r0.y, r0.y, c36.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, r0.y
    mul_pp r0.y, r0.y, r1.z
    add r1, -r1.y, c32
    mad_pp r1, r0.y, r1, c3.y
    mul_pp r0.y, r0.x, r0.x
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, r0.y
    add_pp r2, -r1, c3.y
    mad_pp oC0, r0.x, r2, r1

// approximately 224 instruction slots used (59 texture, 165 arithmetic)
